title: The Role of Protein in Muscle Growth and Recovery
description: Protein plays a vital role in building and repairing muscle tissue. This article explores how much protein you need, the best sources, and timing for optimal results.

sections.title: Why Protein Matters
sections.content: Protein is essential for repairing muscle fibers that are broken down during exercise. Without adequate protein, muscle recovery and growth can be limited.

sections.title: Best Protein Sources
sections.content: High-quality sources include lean meats, fish, dairy, legumes, and plant-based proteins like tofu and tempeh. Whey protein supplements can also be useful.
